Bibliographic References: PP, no. 295, pi. 35a; PPSupp, no. 408; PhV2, p. 39, no. 47; EAA v, p. 339, fig. 457; Gigante, Rintone, pi. 12.
Imagery Description: (a) Phlyax, wearing white tunic, between Dionysos, holding thyrsus and phiale, and draped woman, (b) two draped youths (Al) with a large 'framing' palmette between them; each holds an egg in his concealed r. hand.
